strengths: Mirror Computing is one of the best techs in the game
weaknesses: Nekro flagship is a hard counter
tips: Rush Cruiser II technology (potentially round 1 with green skip)
Leverage mobility for powerful system acquisition
Preserve trade goods until Mirror Computing, then rebuild fleet and pursue 'spend' objectives
Play aggressively early while you have advantage; bank trade goods for Stage II
Defend home system with flagship and PDS II network
Frequently select Trade strategy card and refresh all neighbors
Balance Pillage usage — it makes enemies. Also use it to gain commodities not just trade goods
Use Promise of Protection to secure at least one ally in larger games

techPaths.name: Yellow + Red (with green skip)
techPaths.note: Optimal path; Mirror Computing is the key tech
